text: Basketball at the 2005 Games of the Small States of Europe was held from 30 May to 4 June 2005. Games were played at the Poliesportiu d'Andorra, in Andorra la Vella, Andorra. ==Medal summary== {| |- |Men | | | |- |Women | | | |} ==Men's tournament== Men's tournament was played by a round-robin group composed by five teams. ===Table=== ==Women's tournament== Women's tournament was played by a round-robin group composed by four teams. ===Table=== ==External links== *Andorra 2005 Official Website Small Category:2005 Games of the Small States of Europe 2005 Category:International basketball competitions hosted by Andorra
title: Basketball at the 2005 Games of the Small States of Europe
